title: SSW Twitch no cheese for ctrl+1 ;-;
body: When you ctrl+1 as Twitch with the SSW skin there's no cheese and he's just eating his hand ;-; please do somehting about this riot {{champion:29}}

replies.body:
Heya! 

This is something we're currently aware of and working to fix!

Maybe he rolled around too much and fell into a canyon, getting pinned for the next 127 hours...
[http://i4.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article175525.ece/alternates/s2197/james-franco-as-aron-ralston-in-127-hours-427897391.jpg](http://i4.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article175525.ece/alternates/s2197/james-franco-as-aron-ralston-in-127-hours-427897391.jpg)
